Uses of Interface
net.minecraft.block.cauldron.CauldronBehavior

Packages that use CauldronBehavior
Package
Description
net.minecraft.block.cauldron
Provides the cauldron behavior system, which determines what happens when a player interacts with a cauldron.

  • Uses of CauldronBehavior in net.minecraft.block.cauldron
